entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Uranium City
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.9°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
